Burgers.Description: A crispy potato patty seasoned with Indian spices, served with lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce in a soft bun.
Grilled paneer tikka chunks with our special sauce, onions, and bell peppers in a whole grain bun.
Grilled paneer tikka with aaloo patty in the middle of two fluffy buns served with our special sauce.
A rich, masala-infused vegetable patty with arugula, caramelized onions, and a tangy mint mayo on a pretzel bun.
Marinated tandoori chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mint chutney in a toasted bun.
A succulent mutton patty with spicy mayo, pickled onions, and lettuce on a whole grain bun.
A crispy fish fillet marinated in spices with cabbage slaw and tartar sauce on a potato bun.
A double-layered burger with one spicy chicken patty and one mutton patty, topped with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and a special royal sauce in a brioche bun.

Beverages.Description: Creamy milkshake available in chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.
Creamy hot chocolate made with real cocoa and topped with marshmallows or whipped cream.
A refreshing smoothie made with fresh strawberries, yogurt, and a touch of honey.
A tropical smoothie made with ripe mangoes, yogurt, and a hint of lime.
A nice chilled cold coffee with freshly ground coffee.

Sides.Description: Generic fried available In three sizes.
10 pc chicken nuggets made after killing fattest chickens.
Cheese filled small potato bites will make you come… To us again.

Wraps.Description: Grilled paneer tikka with bell peppers and onions, wrapped in a whole wheat roti.
Crispy falafel balls with hummus, lettuce, and pickled vegetables, wrapped in a pita bread.
Spiced chicken seekh kebab with mint chutney and salad, wrapped in a paratha.
Smoky tandoori chicken pieces with lettuce and a creamy sauce, wrapped in a naan.

Tacos.Description: Spiced mixed vegetables with salsa, sour cream, and cheese in a soft taco shell.
Grilled chicken tikka with onions, cilantro, and a tangy yogurt sauce in a soft taco shell.

Sauces.Description: Classic tomato-based sauce, slightly sweet and tangy.
Creamy and rich sauce made from eggs and oil, perfect for sandwiches and burgers.
A blend of honey and mustard, offering a sweet and tangy flavor.
A smoky and slightly sweet sauce, great for grilled meats and burgers.
Creamy dressing made with buttermilk, garlic, and herbs, perfect for salads and dipping.
Delicious Tandoori Mayo as a dip for your food items.
A smoky and spicy mayonnaise-based sauce with chipotle peppers.

Desserts.Description: A yummy soft serve available in Chocolate and vanilla.
Delicious choco lava cake with chocolate oozing out.
Creamy sweet cold chocolate sundae with choco chips and honey.
Soft, creamy, yummy cheesecake made with high quality cheese.
A generic Chocochip cookie, just more expensive.
A delectable brownie sundae with a brownie and ice cream.
